DOC.brief_summary: This retrospective study aim evaluate safety efficacy rituximab-containing immunochemotherapy adult patient Burkitt 's lymphoma ( BL ) high-grade B-cell lymphoma , unclassifiable , feature intermediate diffuse large B-cell lymphoma BL .
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Analysis Rituximab-containing Immunochemotherapy Burkitt 's Burkitt-like Lymphoma Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion criterion 1. pathologically confirm BL BL-U World Health Organization 2008 criterion 2. age > 20 yr 3. receive rituximab+chemotherapy first-line treatment 4. measurable evaluable lesion 5. complete set clinical laboratory data analysis
DOC.criteria: 1. pathologically confirm Burkitt 's lymphoma ( BL ) High grade Bcell lymphoma , unclassifiable , feature intermediate diffuse large Bcell lymphoma BL ( BLU ) WHO 2008 criterion 2. age > 20 yr 3. receive rituximab+chemotherapy firstline treatment 4. measurable evaluable lesion 1. patient BL BLU previously treat rituximab
